problem_text: A projectile is launched from the top of a cliff of height \(h\) above the ground with initial speed \(v_0\) at angle \(\theta\). Find the time until it hits the ground and the horizontal distance from the cliff base.
diagram_request: Cliff of height h; launch at angle θ from (0,h); parabolic trajectory landing at ground level.
solution_steps: Solve y(T)=0 using quadratic formula; take positive root.
